item.description:
Block Island Trip - MOVED TO RAIN DATE - Monday 5/25
All sun in forecast has been replaced with rain. We will reschedule for tomorrow, same ferry times.

Day Trip to Block Island

Arrival Time: Try arrive 1-hour prior to the ferry leaving - enough time to park, get ticket, and board ferry. To save on time you can purchase your ticket online. Remember it's a holiday weekend.

Parking: Is located down the street from the ferry, and ranges from $5 - $20.

Ferry Ride: Departs at 9:00am. One hour travel time. Round trip is $18.25 + $6.10 for bike. I will be taking return ferry at 5:00pm (last one).

What to bring: Bike (if you don't have one they do rent them on the island for $25, reservation is suggested), towel, sun block, plenty of water, breakfast for ferry ride (concessions are available on boat), bathing suite (just in case), cell phone with my number 508-415-0590, bike lock and towel.

Where we will meet: Area just prior to boarding the ferry. I will wear a bright color shirt. If late, or you don't see me/us just board to ferry and call me and I'll find you. (508-415-0590)

Our day will be filled with lots of fun in the sun! (Hopefully - rain date 5/25) I'll have a loose agenda day of, but we will plan to see a lighthouse or two, visit the beach, browse the shops, stop for lunch, maybe hit Ballarad's and whatever the group is up for.

PLEASE update your MAYBE rsvp to YES or NO by Friday 3:00pm so I have an accurate list of people coming.

This meetup is also open to Girl Fun. A $1.00 meetup fee will be collected at our lunch stop.
item.name: Day Trip to Block Island
